title: Audit of sanitation branch
context: [§321-27.5] Audit of sanitation branch. The department shall perform annual audits of the sanitation branch to be completed by November 30 of each year, and shall include an audit of: (1) Fees collected; (2) The number and results of sanitation inspections; (3) The number of training seminars held; and (4) The cost of training personnel in the sanitation branch. [L 1997, c 334, pt of §1]
